snippet: With the European Central Bank’s extraordinary level of support for bonds, mutual fund managers are reaping big returns on purchases from Portugal, Italy, Spain and Ireland.
abstract: With the European Central Bank’s extraordinary level of support for bonds, mutual fund managers are reaping big returns on purchases from Portugal, Italy, Spain and Ireland.

headline.main: Bets on European Bonds Paying Off for Funds
headline.print_headline: Bets on European Bonds Paying Off for Funds
